verses.verse: וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> become הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> war אֲרֻכָּ֔ה <WH752> Now there was long בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> between the house שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and the house דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וְדָוִד֙ <WH1732> but David הֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> waxed וְחָזֵ֔ק <WH2390> stronger וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and the house שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> of Saul הֹלְכִ֥ים <WH1980> waxed וְדַלִּֽים׃ <WH1800> weaker ס

[וַיֵּלְדוּ כ] (וַיִּוָּלְד֧וּ <WH3205> bear ק) לְדָוִ֛ד <WH1732> And unto David בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> were sons בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> in Hebron וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become בְכוֹרוֹ֙ <WH1060> and his firstborn אַמְנ֔וֹן <WH550> was Amnon לַאֲחִינֹ֖עַם <WH293> of Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽת׃ <WH3159> the Jezreelitess

וּמִשְׁנֵ֣הוּ <WH4932> And his second כִלְאָ֔ב <WH3609> Chileab [לַאֲבִיגֵל כ] (לַאֲֽבִיגַ֕יִל <WH26> Abigal ק) אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> the wife נָבָ֣ל <WH5037> of Nabal הַֽכַּרְמְלִ֑י <WH3761> the Carmelite וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <WH7992> and the third אַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH53> Absalom בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son מַעֲכָ֔ה <WH4601> of Maacah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter תַּלְמַ֖י <WH8526> of Talmai מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king גְּשֽׁוּר׃ <WH1650> of Geshur

וְהָרְבִיעִ֖י <WH7243> And the fourth אֲדֹנִיָּ֣ה <WH138> Adonijah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חַגִּ֑ית <WH2294> of Haggith וְהַחֲמִישִׁ֖י <WH2549> and the fifth שְׁפַטְיָ֥ה <WH8203> Shephatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲבִיטָֽל׃ <WH37> of Abital

וְהַשִּׁשִּׁ֣י <WH8345> And the sixth יִתְרְעָ֔ם <WH3507> Ithream לְעֶגְלָ֖ה <WH5698> by Eglah אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David's אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These יֻלְּד֥וּ <WH3205> These were born לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> in Hebron פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּֽהְיוֹת֙ <WH1961> came הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> And it came to pass while there was war בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> between the house שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and the house דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וְאַבְנֵ֛ר <WH74> that Abner הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came מִתְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> made himself strong בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> for the house שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> of Saul

וּלְשָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> And Saul פִּלֶ֔גֶשׁ <WH6370> had a concubine וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <WH8034> whose name רִצְפָּ֣ה <WH7532> [was] Rizpah בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter אַיָּ֑ה <WH345> of Aiah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and [Ishbosheth] said אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְנֵ֔ר <WH74> to Abner מַדּ֥וּעַ <WH4069> Why בָּ֖אתָה <WH935> Wherefore hast thou gone in אֶל־ <WH413> had a פִּילֶ֥גֶשׁ <WH6370> concubine אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> unto my father's

וַיִּחַר֩ <WH2734> wroth לְאַבְנֵ֨ר <WH74> Then was Abner מְאֹ֜ד <WH3966> very עַל־ <WH5921> over דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> for the words אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֗שֶׁת <WH378> of Ishbosheth וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said הֲרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> head כֶּ֥לֶב <WH3611> [Am] I a dog's אָנֹ֘כִי֮ <WH595> I אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לִֽיהוּדָה֒ <WH3063> which against Judah הַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> this day אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> do shew חֶ֜סֶד <WH2617> kindness עִם־ <WH5973> with בֵּ֣ית ׀ <WH1004> unto the house שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> of Saul אָבִ֗יךָ <WH1> thy father אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> to his brethren וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מֵ֣רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH4828> and to his friends וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not הִמְצִיתִ֖ךָ <WH4672> and have not delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> thee into the hand דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַתִּפְקֹ֥ד <WH6485> that thou chargest עָלַ֛י <WH5921> over עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> with a fault הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> the woman הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> me to day

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> so יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> So do אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God לְאַבְנֵ֔ר <WH74> to Abner וְכֹ֖ה <WH3541> also יֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> and more also ל֑וֹ כִּ֗י <WH3588> if כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> hath sworn יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> except as the LORD לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> to David כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if כֵ֖ן <WH3651> this אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> even so I do לּֽוֹ׃

לְהַֽעֲבִ֥יר <WH5674> To translate הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> the kingdom מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> of Saul וּלְהָקִ֞ים <WH6965> and to set up אֶת־ <WH853> כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> the throne דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> of David עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> over Israel וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and over Judah מִדָּ֖ן <WH1835> from Dan וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> even to Beersheba

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יָכֹ֣ל <WH3201> And he could ע֔וֹד <WH5750> longer לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> not answer אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְנֵ֖ר <WH74> Abner דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> a word מִיִּרְאָת֖וֹ <WH3372> again because he feared אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> ס

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> sent אַבְנֵ֨ר <WH74> And Abner מַלְאָכִ֧ים ׀ <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> to David [תַּחַתֹו כ] (תַּחְתָּ֥יו <WH8478> Thahash ק) לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> on his behalf saying לְמִי־ <WH4310> Whose אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> common לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כָּרְתָ֤ה <WH3772> [also] Make בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <WH1285> thy league אִתִּ֔י <WH854> for וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold יָדִ֣י <WH3027> with me and behold my hand עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> you לְהָסֵ֥ב <WH5437> [shall be] with thee to bring about אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> all Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said ט֔וֹב <WH2896> Well אֲנִ֕י <WH589> I אֶכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> I will make אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> for בְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> a league אַ֣ךְ <WH389> also דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> thing אֶחָ֡ד <WH259> with thee but one אָנֹכִי֩ <WH595> I שֹׁאֵ֨ל <WH7592> I require מֵאִתְּךָ֤ <WH854> for לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> of thee that is לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנַ֔י <WH6440> my face כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> except thou first הֱבִיאֲךָ֗ <WH935> bring אֵ֚ת <WH853> מִיכַ֣ל <WH4324> Michal בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> Saul's בְּבֹאֲךָ֖ <WH935> when thou comest לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> to see אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָֽי׃ <WH6440> my face ס

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> about אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֥שֶׁת <WH378> to Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <WH1121> son שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul's לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying תְּנָ֤ה <WH5414> Deliver אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתִּי֙ <WH802> [me] my wife אֶת־ <WH853> מִיכַ֔ל <WH4324> Michal אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> to whom אֵרַ֣שְׂתִּי <WH781> which I espoused לִ֔י בְּמֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> to me for an hundred עָרְל֥וֹת <WH6190> foreskins פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> sent אִ֣ישׁ בֹּ֔שֶׁת <WH378> And Ishbosheth וַיִּקָּחֶ֖הָ <WH3947> and took מֵ֣עִֽם <WH5973> with אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> her from [her] husband מֵעִ֖ם <WH5973> from פַּלְטִיאֵ֥ל <WH6409> [even] from Phaltiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son [לוּשׁ כ] (לָֽיִשׁ׃ <WH3919> Laish ק)

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went אִתָּ֜הּ <WH854> But אִישָׁ֗הּ <WH376> And her husband הָל֧וֹךְ <WH1980> went וּבָכֹ֛ה <WH1058> her weeping אַחֲרֶ֖יהָ <WH310> behind עַד־ <WH5704> far בַּֽחֻרִ֑ים <WH980> her to Bahurim וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> then אַבְנֵ֛ר <WH74> Abner לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Go שׁ֖וּב <WH7725> return וַיָּשֹֽׁב׃ <WH7725> And he returned

וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> consultation אַבְנֵ֣ר <WH74> And Abner הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> had עִם־ <WH5973> with זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> with the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying גַּם־ <WH1571> in תְּמוֹל֙ <WH8543> in times גַּם־ <WH1571> again שִׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <WH8032> past הֱיִיתֶ֞ם <WH1961> had מְבַקְשִׁ֧ים <WH1245> Ye sought אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> for David לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [to be] king עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> over

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now עֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> Now then do כִּ֣י <WH3588> For יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [it] for the LORD אָמַ֤ר <WH559> hath spoken אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> of David לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בְּיַ֣ד ׀ <WH3027> By the hand דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> David עַבְדִּ֗י <WH5650> of my servant הוֹשִׁ֜יעַ <WH3467> I will save אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֤י <WH5971> my people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וּמִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> and out of the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH341> of all their enemies

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> also spake גַּם־ <WH1571> also אַבְנֵ֖ר <WH74> And Abner בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> in the ears בִנְיָמִ֑ין <WH1144> of Benjamin וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went גַּם־ <WH1571> addition אַבְנֵ֗ר <WH74> and Abner לְדַבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> also to speak בְּאָזְנֵ֤י <WH241> in the ears דָוִד֙ <WH1732> of David בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> in Hebron אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after טוֹב֙ <WH2896> good בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> all that seemed יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> to Israel וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> and that seemed good כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to the whole house בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> of Benjamin

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came אַבְנֵ֤ר <WH74> So Abner אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> to David חֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> to Hebron וְאִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> and twenty אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> men וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> made דָּוִ֧ד <WH1732> with him And David לְאַבְנֵ֛ר <WH74> Abner וְלַאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> and the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for מִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH4960> that [were] with him a feast

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְנֵ֣ר <WH74> And Abner אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֡ד <WH1732> unto David אָק֣וּמָה ׀ <WH6965> I will arise וְֽאֵלֵ֡כָה <WH1980> and go וְאֶקְבְּצָה֩ <WH6908> and will gather אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנִ֨י <WH113> unto my lord הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> all Israel וְיִכְרְת֤וּ <WH3772> that they may make אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> for בְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> a league וּמָ֣לַכְתָּ֔ <WH4427> with thee and that thou mayest reign בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after תְּאַוֶּ֖ה <WH183> desireth נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH5315> over all that thine heart וַיְּשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> away דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְנֵ֖ר <WH74> Abner וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> in peace

וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> and behold עַבְדֵ֨י <WH5650> And behold the servants דָוִ֤ד <WH1732> of David וְיוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> and Joab בָּ֣א <WH935> came מֵֽהַגְּד֔וּד <WH1416> from [pursuing] a troop וְשָׁלָ֥ל <WH7998> spoil רָ֖ב <WH7227> a great עִמָּ֣ם <WH5973> with הֵבִ֑יאוּ <WH935> and brought in וְאַבְנֵ֗ר <WH74> with them but Abner אֵינֶ֤נּוּ <WH369> else עִם־ <WH5973> with דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> [was] not with David בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> in Hebron כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שִׁלְּח֖וֹ <WH7971> for he had sent him away וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> had gone בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> in peace
